sentence: Moreover, even if the committee did subpoena McCarthy, Jim Jordan, and Scott Perry, it’s unclear whether it would be able to compel them to speak.
author: Daniel Strauss
title: A Good Week for the January 6 Committee Means a Bad Week for Donald Trump

sentence: You also have Reps. Lauren Boebert and Ken Buck of Colorado, Madison Cawthorn of North Carolina, Ronny Jackson of Texas and Jim Jordan of Ohio.
author: STATION GOSSIP
title: Not Satire: 'RINO Convention' Days Away - Guest List is a Who's Who of Rabid Trump-Haters

sentence: Leaders of the “Stop the Steal” movement were also participating and according to a tweet from Republican Rep. Mo Brooks of Alabama that evening, over 50 congresspeople were on the call, including Rep. Jim Jordan.
title: Coterie of Trump's election fraud lawyers hit with Jan. 6 committee subpoenas
